languages.text: "Мутация в сервиторе? Обычно {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} отвергают неполноценные мягкие ткани для своих конструктов. Возможно, что-то вызвало агрессивный рост — совсем недавно".

"A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."
languages.original_text: "Мутация в сервиторе? Обычно {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} отвергают неполноценные мягкие ткани для своих конструктов. Возможно, что-то вызвало агрессивный рост — совсем недавно".

traits.locale_text: "A mutation in a Servitor? Tech-Priests typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."
"A mutation in a Servitor? Tech-Priests typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

"A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

"A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

"A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

"A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

languages.text: “机仆发生了变异？通常而言，{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}是不会使用有缺陷的组织进行机仆改造的。或许这样的增生是某种原因导致的，而且是最近不久才发生的。”
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: “奴工发生了变异？通常而言，{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}是不会使用有缺陷的组织进行奴工改造的。或许这样的增生是某种原因导致的，而且是最近不久才发生的。”

languages.text: «¿Mutación en un servidor? Por lo general, los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} rechazan el uso de tejidos blandos defectuosos en sus creaciones. Tal vez algo haya causado este crecimiento agresivo... y ha sido reciente».
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: «¿Mutación en un servidor? Por lo general, los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} rechazan el uso de tejidos blandos defectuosos en sus creaciones. Tal vez algo haya causado este crecimiento agresivo... y ha sido reciente».

languages.text: 「サーヴィターが突然変異だと？通常なら{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は、システムに欠陥のある肉体を使うことは拒む。おそらく何かのせいで急激に変化を遂げたのかもな…それもごく最近に」
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: 「サーヴィターが突然変異だと？通常なら{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は、システムに欠陥のある肉体を使うことは拒む。おそらく何かのせいで急激に変化を遂げたのかもな…それもごく最近に」

languages.text: "Eine Mutation in einem Servitor? Normalerweise benutzen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} kein fehlerhaftes weiches Gewebe für ihre Konstrukte. Vermutlich hat etwas dieses aggressive Wachstum verursacht – und es ist noch nicht lange her."
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Mutation in einem Servitor? Normalerweise benutzen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} kein fehlerhaftes weiches Gewebe für ihre Konstrukte. Vermutlich hat etwas dieses aggressive Wachstum verursacht – und es ist noch nicht lange her."

languages.text: « Une mutation chez un servitor ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} refusent généralement d'utiliser des chairs imparfaites dans leurs créations. Il est possible que cette croissance agressive, et fort récente, n'ait rien de naturel. »
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: « Une mutation chez un servitor ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtes{/g} refusent généralement d'utiliser des chairs imparfaites dans leurs créations. Il est possible que cette croissance agressive, et fort récente, n'ait rien de naturel. »

languages.text: "Hizmetörde mutasyon mu? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}, standart olarak yapılarında kusurlu yumuşak doku kullanımından kaçınır. Belki de bu agresif büyümeye başka bir şey, yeni neden olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "A mutation in a servitor? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} typically reject the use of flawed soft tissue for their constructs. Perhaps something has caused this aggressive growth — and quite recently."

traits.locale_text: "Servitörde mutasyon mu? {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} standart olarak yapılarında kusurlu yumuşak doku kullanımından kaçınır. Belki de bu agresif büyümeye başka bir şey, oldukça yakın zamanda neden oldu."
